alert.note: Alert for Limestone (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 27 at 9:16AM CDT until April 28 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Navasota River Above Groesbeck affecting Limestone County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navasota River Above Groesbeck. * WHEN...From this evening to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor out of bank flow will occur along the left bank of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:55 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 2.9 feet. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 7.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
